title: Outgoing emails are not copied in "sent" mailbox
content:
Hi There, My outgoing emails are getting sent, but not copied in the sent mailbox. My server settings (as David suggested to be revealed) are as follow: IMAP Incoming IMAP SSL/TLS outlook.office365.com Outgoing SMTP STARTTLS SMTP.office365.com

I have tried everything i.e. checking and unchecking "Copy emails in the sent mailbox" and nothing helped. Please help. P.S. Initially my goal was to reach the TB developers, but I saw that so many issuis are reported and not fixed for so many years... I'd really appreciate if somebody genious from the community could help me. Thank you in advance, Paul.

title: All my inbound emails in Thunderbird are all DRAFT messages it wasn't always this way until Firefox update
content: I never seemed to have a problem with my Mozilla Thunderbird but shortly after the last Mozilla Firefox update my inbound email thru Mozilla Thunderbird come into my inbound email box as DRAFT Messages. this is a big problem because I can't reply and or forward because there is no (((send))) showing up anywhere. Nobody seems to know how to solve this problem so it must be a first. My wife is on the same Home network as I and she has no problem like mine. I hate to reinstall Thunderbird because I don't know if it would interfere with all here computer info especially with her Thunderbird which seem to be OK (( No inbound Draft email Messages )). I use cox as my IP and mail coming into their email does not have a inbound draft problem, nor does AOL or GMail just Mozilla Thunderbird.

title: Slow Thunderbird Sends
content:
Hi, We have been running Thunderbird for years now with happy users.

Recently all our clients have found that sending email takes about 10 seconds to send. The exception is the client on our own email server (hMailServer). This client sends very quickly.

We continue to receive email.

I can ping my router, peers and mail server with <1ms response. My internet speed is fast.

My mail server gets fast response times from MxToolbox.

Not sure where to go from here.

Shalom Norman

title: vpis naslova e-pošte
content:
V Thunderbrid bi rad samodejno namestil svoj e-naslov (poštni predal) pri Telemachu (Smrekar.ales@telemach.net). Ob registraciji je bil definiran je strežnik odhajajoče pošte SMTP smtp.telemach.net in prihajajoče pošte (POP3) pop3.telemach.net Na njihovi spletni strani uspem z vklopom v pošto z enakim uporabniškim imenom in geslom kot ga uporabljam pri inštalaciji v Thunderbridu. Iz tega sklepam o pravilnosti uporabniškega imena in gesla. Ali je potrebno pri tem izvesti še kakšne druge ročne nastavitve?

pozdrav Aleš
creator: smrekar.ales
